title: Drupal security advisory (AV25-806)
description: On December 3, 2025, Drupal published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following product:
products: Login Time Restriction  versions prior to 1.0.3
Next.js  versions prior to 1.6.4, version 2.0.0 to version prior to 2.0.1
Entity Share  versions prior to 3.x-3.13, versions prior to 3.13.0
Disable Login Page  versions prior to 1.1.3
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
